attributes.title: Time I will never get get back
attributes.review: I was excited to download this app to learn all about the republican agenda for the future ☺️ but couldn’t even open the app once cause my phone started to automatically autocorrect everything I typed into hate speech! 😡 Also, my phone background changed to some orange racist man and my doctor said I lost 40 IQ points just by reading the description of the app!! Oh well, time to go back to Tik Tok. 😘

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This dude is mentally ill.. and that’s all that needs to be said.

attributes.title: So disappointed...
attributes.review: I am absolutely HORRIFIED at what this app has done to me. I initially downloaded the app thinking “okay now I have some preconceived notions about this man but since all of his supporters say we’re overreacting, maybe this app will show me who he really is”. Sad to say, I was highly disappointed. When the app FINALLY downloaded after a week, I was met with the face of 45 himself, and to say it scarred me would be an understatement. Not only was his tan uneven, but he was holding up a very pale, wrinkled fist. I can only hope he was not mocking the BLM symbol. This app seriously gave me nightmares, just remembering how 45 pushed all those supporters out to walk to a church and have a photo op wit a borrowed, upside-down bible and how he managed to get trolled by teenagers and young adults who can’t even ask for extra ketchup packets at restaurants (but it somehow able to run a country??) gives me the chills. 0 out of 10 do not recommend this app. Smh, he could at least put some flavor into the design 🙄.
